title: What is the best way to start up a tech company from scratch? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of you need a product or service. Something that someone else is interested in. This can be in fact literally everything. If you can pick up a stone from the ground and someone on the planet wants to give you 1 million $ for it.. then you did business. The reality is a bit more complex, since stones are not rare and not delivering any kind of value that is worth much for anyone. So you first of need some kind of product/experice/service, that someone else would love to pay for. Good thing: Every person knows or owns something that someone else don’t know and would love to pay money for, to save a lot of time and get the right solution from an expert. So you first have to identifiy what you are good at and what you literally LOVE to do. Something that you would do for literally free. You get no payment? Doesn’t matter, you love to do it so much, that you still do it! I for my self love to support other people by their life journey. That’s the reason I spend worthy time to write this instead of closing another 4–7 figure call. Why am I doing this? Because I literally LOVE doing this. This makes me so happy that I love to wake up every monday at 6am and be excited to help another person in his life. The fact that I love it, makes me keep doing it and repeat it like tons of time. That way I automatically get TONS of experience. You see.. you can say that I am an “Expert” in this “job”. At first I wasn’t even aware that this type of thing can be sold to anyone. You probably will struggle the say way. The reason is pretty is.. it’s so “self-evident” for you and so easy for you, that you can’t understand.., can’t live the way.., can’t feel how in the hells name someone else could struggle with this and would even pay a lot of money for it. It can be drawing, singing, dancing, training/petting dogs, marketing, coaching, advertising, development, fishing, computer gaming, house buying, consulting people to decide which Rolex they should buy, help people to lose weight, build up muscles, teach people to cook, there are people who teaching how to catch pikeperch fishes and he gets 2500–5000€ for it every time and with the help of the next steps I will mention, he gets more than enough customers to become wealthy. Don’t underestimate this task. It’s a lot of work and going DEEP inside your brain to find that thing you love to do and can deliver value to others. After you found it, the next step is to position your self. You need to know ATOMIC PRECISELY to WHO you want to sell your product/service. If your answer is “to everyone who needs it..”, then you have to keep digging deeper. Let me give you an example with my job. I am a Business- and Motivationcoach. Do you have a slight clue what I am selling right now? Would you pay me 4–5 figures for that “description”? Let me change that “description” a little bit. “I am support small and middle sized companies to increase their income by multiple 5–6 figures per month within 6–12 month, simply by directing them how to position themself correctly in the market, become visible to their perfect audience with the help of precise targeting and prevent them doing unnecessary, time wasting stuff by creating borders that stops doing them and a solid guideline that they simply have to follow step by step to reach their specific goal”. 20–30 seconds pitch that is giving the most important information. For WHO is my service? Small- and Middle Sized Companies What is my service? Increase their monthly income to 5–6 figures In which time span? 6–12 month How am I gonna do it? Positioning, precise target advertising, creating borders and giving a step by step guideline Is this everything? No! There are TONS of more things that are giving so much value, but there is a saying that says “a jack of all trades is a master of none”, therefore you have to be VERY precisely digging deep into a single area. You want your target audience to EXACTLY know what you can deliver and those that see this will be “OMG! THIS! EXACTLY THIS! This dude perfectly understands my needs!” Imagine you are out in the desert.. you are thirsty.. really thirsty.. and there you see this cactus and from one of those Bear Grylls episodes you saw that they have some sort of juice in them.. so fuck it, you take your time and do everything, even hurt your self, just to get this juice! You really want to drink it! Imagine your nose is full of dirt and you really need to clean it.. you search for the very next best tissue you can find. In Germany we have a company named “Tempo” that sells handkerchiefs. They made their brand such way that when you need to clean your nose, you ask for a “tempo taschentuch” => “tempo handkerchief” or just a tempo. If you can’t find a tempo, you simply take the next best kitchen roll… you see? It’s not the product, it’s the result you get! No one cares about you, no one cares about your school degrees or your master of XXX. The only important question is: Can you solve his/her problem? Can you make his/her wish/dream/desire to become true? If you can find out their deep desire, you can sell them anything for any price. Literally. Let’s make a quick summary: You need a product/service that you love to do and others would love to receive and pay for itYou need to position your self to a specific audience, even if you can do 1000 other really valuable thingsNext step is to become visible. Let’s say you have the cure against the current pandemic situation. You could sell it for millions, but if no one knows you.. if no one “sees” you. If you are literally invisible for the world.. you won’t be ever able to sell it. So you need market your self and out your self as an Expert. People love to receive their solutions from an Expert in a specific area. The more and better you can describe and speak about your product/service, the more you out your self as an Expert. Quick question: If you read my initial example pitch. Before and after reading my comment explaining what you have to do. How much would you see me as an expert “before” and how much would you see me as an expert “after” you read this all? Does what I am saying make sense for you or do you believe that I talk bullshit about something I have no clue about? You see.. If you simply using your experience and talk about it with a deep passion behind it.. there is literally no way that you can’t be seen as Expert. This is simple Math. 1 + 1 +1 = 3 There is no deep complex and unnecessary bullshit around. It’s simply “Service + People who wants that service = Sold service”. The biggest mistake 90%+ companies do is to compare themself with big companies like Microsoft or Facebook. You are at least 10 levels below MS or FB! Strategies that they do for their company are 10000 times different than you NEED for YOUR company level. There is no sense in doing a 1 million $ marketing campaign, because you don’t even own 1 million $! There is no sense in doing several hardcore funnel systems, with a 100 page blog, +100 episode podcast, email marketing and all those time consuming stuff and try to build a brand, when you are not even visible, don’t have any reputation to build up a brand and can’t even effort to build up a brand! You have to shut down your inner ego, which is like a hell of a job, and then you need to do the stuff that are good for YOUR company level. If you earn less or similiar to 10k per month, chances are high that you are at a very beginner level of a company. What you need to focus on is: Your product/servicePositioningBecoming visibleCLOSE!Let’s come to the last step I am gonna reveal to you. It doesn’t matter how many leads you can attract. The reason all this marketing stuff is usefull for you is the simple reason that you first of need to use up all the EXISTING sources of leads, BEFORE you going into the process of optimizing the lead generation. All those marketing stuff do work. Don’t missunderstand me. They are very effective and help you to attract “even more” customers. But they are EXTREMLY time consuming! All this work is not generating your self a single dollar! Literally! I could give you EVERYTHING of that and you could be the most famous guy on the internet. You get 0$ out of it. The only thing that those “tools” are made for is the fact to generate leads. Leads alone are worth nothing! You need to actually CLOSE them. You have to sell your product/service to them in a way that they accept you make a agreement out of it. You could have NOTHING, but just words and promises and you could “CLOSE” someone for real money. Some people are actually doing it this way. They promise things, sell the promise to someone and then buy the promise from someone else, with the money they just got from the closing. Does that matter for the customer? Who cares HOW you doing it, if in the end you can deliver what you promise. No customer does care about “how”. It’s just a curiosity and being unsure if the person really can deliver the promise.. but if you can make it real.. they don’t care at all. Countries literally selling weapons to finance wars in other countries. Do you care? I think it’s morally terrible bullshit, but I am not carring enough to do more than “thinking” that it’s bad. Water from Nestle.. people literally dying and starving from thirsy. Is anyone carring if their OWN thirst is getting solved by Nestle providing them water? How about you can deliver something without being a terrible person? Without being responsible about a full genocide? By providing REAL value just by your own experience? 1000000000 times better! So you see.. you first need to “use” the existing leads and start having a simple start lead generation source, before you dive deep into the optimization process, which will increase your lead amounts. But if you can’t even close the existing ones.. how are you supposed to close additional ones? Being a Entrepreneur is not only “doing” something and the “doing” part is already a full movie with 6 prequells, 8 seasons, 12 post-future seasons with several DLCs and different endings. But there is more, which also have their own full universe of things to know and to do. You have to keep up a high level of self confidence. You need a rock hard willpower, which sounds easier than it is in reality. In fact thats one of the biggest weak points of 95% of humans. Tons of wrong mindsets are holding us way under our potentials. If you asked your self why my initial job description contained the “Motivation” part, well here it is. It’s EXTREMLY hard to find out how the hell you need to develop your own personallity the way, that it will actually help you instead of preventing you from success. Each new level of company will require your self to become a new version of your self. Your Person that made you reach Company Level 1 can’t make you reach Level 2. If it could, it already would have made it. If you could do Millions by now, you would do it right now. That’s a clear sign that you are not the person who deserves the million right now. So what you gonna do? You develop your personallity! Personal Development is what you need. It’s like a big puzzle. It’s really not that hard in the theoretic aspect. The only “close to impossible”-hard thing is the psychologic practical part. But “close to” implies that it is actually possible. In fact EVERY person could be wealthy. But not every person WANTS to be healthy. Not every person is HUNGRY enought and not WILLING to PAY THE PRICE. The price is so damn high that if someone would give you one million dollars.. it would take you a few months before you are deep into depths agains, because your mentality is still not on the level of a milionar. To make it short.. Conclusion to answer your question: You have to develop a new personalityYou need a service/productPosition your selfMake your self visibleCLOSE!You have to develop a new personalityRepeat

The best way is to find a customer that needs a solution to a problem and is willing to let you develop it with them or wait for it to be ready. Some may probably give you some cash advance. Even when they only pay you in the end you will not be getting in debt so your failure risk is very low. But the main advantage of starting with a customer is that you will immediately be in business. Most company projects fail because they start by spending money instead of making money That is what I call a StartDown instead of a StartUp, You should see the profit graph go up before you call it a startup or a business. They spend money in all sorts of things that don’t make money renting an office, buying a car (do you really need a car to deliver software? I’ve seen it happen so I didn't invest in it), even small things like business cards, the website a logo will spend your money and time and make no money in return if you are a startup. If the money spent comes from credit then add the interest to the expense and you have a recipe for massive failure. This is a very real problem because most wannabe entrepreneurs can’t sell anything to anyone so they will never get a paying customer to cover for all the expenses of the starting phase. But the real beauty of a tech company is that if it’s software that you are making you can get all the tools for free, work from home and not spend anything. What you need to learn is to sell even before you have a product and agree with the customer on how and when you will deliver. That is how Bill Gates started Microsoft.
